<file>
00001| # <a name="up"/>Vozovoz API 2.5
00002| 
00003| [Main page](/en/README.md) > [Objects](index.md) > Order
00004| 
00005| 
00006| > **Object code: `order`**
00007| 
00008| ## Contents
00009| 
00010| * [Description](#description)
00011| * [Getting data for one or more orders](#get)
00012|     * [Example of the structure](#get-example)
00013|     * [Description of the structure](#get-struct)
00014|     * [Response data](#get-response)
00015|     * [Examples](#get-example-full)
00016| * [Sending data. Finalizing an order](#set)
00017|     * [Example of the structure](#set-example)
00018|     * [Description of the structure](#set-struct)
00019|     * [Response data](#set-response)
00020|     * [Examples](#set-example-full)
00021| * [Canceling an order](#cancel)
00022| 
00023| 
00024| ## <a name="description"/>Description
00025| 
00026| Represents an object used to place (finalize) an order or to obtain data on already placed order(s).
00027| 
00028| >In this manual for easier understanding a word **_structures_** will be used
00029| to name any structured data (mostly that contains other structures inside,
00030| but also that contains simple data types, like string, number, boolean).
00031| We name **full** necessary data object, that used in a request to our server
00032| — ["parameters"](../params/index.md). Key to pass "parameters" into a request
00033| called "params". More about that [here](../params/post.md). And we name **_nodes_**
00034| certain structures with a defined key, that this structure is assigned to.
00035| 
00036| 
00037| ## <a name="get"/>Getting data. Action `get`
00038| 
00039| ### Request data
00040| 
00041| > In this request every structure is **_optional_**, that is, it can be omitted.
00042| 
00043| ***
00044| 
00045| Quick navigation
00046| 
00047| * [Example of the structure](#get-example)
00048| * [Root structure](#get-struct)
00049|     * [Filtering results](#get-filters)
00050|         * [By date](#get-filters-dates)
00051|             * [By creation date](#get-filters-dates-created)
00052|         * [By location](#get-location)
00053|     * [Order state](#get-mode)
00054| 
00055| ***
00056| 
00057| #### <a name="get-example"/>Example of the structure
00058| 
00059| In the following example every filter is set, this is done completely for illustration,
00060| most likely you won't need all of them in one request. So, as you can guess it, pass only the nodes you need.
00061| 
00062| ```javascript
00063| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00064| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00065| {
00066|   "object": "order",
00067|   "action": "get",
00068|   "params": {
00069|     "filters": {
00070|       "dates": { // date filter, all filters inside this object considered to be combined by the AND condition 
00071|         "created": { // date of the order finalization
00072|           "from": "2017-05-01", // start of the date diapason for filtering
00073|           "to": "2017-06-15" // end of the date diapason for filtering
00074|         }
00075|       },
00076|       "location": { // all filters inside this object considered to be combined by the AND condition
00077|         "dispatch": "12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012", // dispatch location filter
00078|         "destination": "12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012" // destination location filter
00079|       },
00080|       "number": [ // can be a single string or an array of any of the following 
00081|         // NOTE: all values inside this array considered to be combined by the OR condition
00082|         "12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012", // unique internal order ID
00083|         "700099999", // order number
00084|         "CW23423/dsf332233 (май 2017)" // custom order number, if you specified it in finalization request
00085|       ]
00086|     },
00087|     "limit": 100, // limiting the number of selection results
00088|     "offset": 0, // selection offset
00089|     "mode": { // for more details, see the structure "Order state"
00090|       "isCanceled": false, // does the order have to be canceled to be included in the results
00091|       "isGiven": false, // does the order have to be given out to client to be included in the results
00092|       "isPaid": false, // does the order have to be paid to be included in the results
00093|       "isTaken": true // does the order have to be accepted at the dispatch terminal to be included in the results
00094|     },
00095|     "tab": "onward" // "onward" - On the way, "unpaid" - Speaks for itself, more details in the structure...
00096|   }
00097| }));
00098| ```
00099| 
00100| ***
00101| 
00102| #### <a name="get-struct"/>Root structure. Passed directly into the `params` node
00103| 
00104| | Structure | Type    | Description                                                                                                                                           |
00105| |-----------|---------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00106| | `filters` | object  | [Order Filter structure](#get-filters)                                                                                                                |
00107| | `limit`   | integer | Limits the number of results returned                                                                                                                 |
00108| | `offset`  | integer | Offsets the number of results returned                                                                                                                |
00109| | `mode`    | object  | [Order State structure](#get-mode). Mutually exclusive with the `tab` node                                                                            |
00110| | `tab`     | string  | A string that sets a predefined order filter. Mutually exclusive with the `mode` node, since it contains pre-configured parameters of the `mode` node |
00111| 
00112| >Predefined order filters (`tab` node) that are currently available:
00113| >* The `onward` value for the `tab` node defines the following values for the `mode` node:
00114| >```
00115| >{
00116| >  "isCanceled": false, // to be included in results order should not be canceled
00117| >  "isGiven": false // to be included in results order should not be given out to client
00118| >}
00119| >```
00120| >* The `unpaid` value for the `tab` node defines the following values for the `mode` node:
00121| >```
00122| >{
00123| >  "isCanceled": false, // to be included in results order should not be canceled
00124| >  "isPaid": false, // to be included in results order should not be payed at the moment
00125| >  "isTaken": true // to be included in results order should be accepted at the shipping terminal
00126| >}
00127| >```
00128| 
00129| ***
00130| 
00131| #### <a name="get-filters"/>Order Filter structure. The `params.filters` node
00132| 
00133| > Part of the [root structure](#get-struct) under the key `filters`.
00134| 
00135| | Name       | Type          | Description                                                                                                                                                                         |
00136| |------------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00137| | `dates`    | object        | [Date Filter structure](#get-filters-dates)                                                                                                                                         |
00138| | `customer` | object        | [Customer Filter structure](#get-filters-customer)                                                                                                                                  |
00139| | `location` | object        | [Location Filter structure](#get-filters-location)                                                                                                                                  |
00140| | `number`   | array\|string | A string or array with order numbers (or unique order ID, or custom numbers, that you could specify in order finalization). _In this structure order of the values does not matter_ |
00141| 
00142| ***
00143| 
00144| #### <a name="get-filters-dates"/>Date Filter structure. The `params.filters.dates` node
00145| 
00146| > Part of the [Order Filter structure](#get-filters) under the key `dates`.
00147| 
00148| Currently there is only one date filter node available: `created`. It's responsible for the order creation (finalization) date.
00149| 
00150| | Name      | Type   | Description                                                  |
00151| |-----------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
00152| | `created` | object | [Creation Date Filter structure](#get-filters-dates-created) |
00153| 
00154| ***
00155| 
00156| #### <a name="get-filters-dates-created"/>Creation Date Filter structure. The `params.filters.dates.created` node
00157| 
00158| > Part of the [Date Filter structure](#get-filters-dates) under the key `created`.
00159| 
00160| | Name   | Type   | Description                                                                                                                                                              |
00161| |--------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00162| | `from` | string | A string in `YYYY-MM-DD` format, responsible for the first date of the filtering range by the order creation date and until today, or the day specified in the `to` node |
00163| | `to`   | string | A string in `YYYY-MM-DD` format, responsible for the last date of the filtering range by order creation date                                                             |
00164| 
00165| ***
00166| 
00167| #### <a name="get-filters-location"/>Location Filter structure. The `params.filters.location` node
00168| 
00169| > Part of the [Order Filter structure](#get-filters) under the key `location`.
00170| 
00171| | Name          | Type   | Description                                                                                                            |
00172| |---------------|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00173| | `destination` | string | Unique location identifier. Request returns only those orders where specified location is the **destination** location |
00174| | `dispatch`    | string | Unique location identifier. Request returns only those orders where specified location is the **dispatch** location    |
00175| 
00176| ***
00177| 
00178| #### <a name="get-mode"/>Order State structure. The `params.mode` node
00179| 
00180| > Part of the [root structure](#get-struct) under the key `mode`.
00181| 
00182| Not specifying the order state implies that you are satisfied with both options for the order state.
00183| Specifying `false` insists that orders **having** this state are **excluded** from the result selection.
00184| Specifying `true` insists that orders **not having** this state are **excluded** from the result selection.
00185| 
00186| | Name         | Type    | Description                                                                                                         |
00187| |--------------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00188| | `isCanceled` | boolean | An order has to be canceled (`true`) or not canceled (`false`) to be included in the results                        |
00189| | `isGiven`    | boolean | An order has to be given out (`true`) or not given out (`false`) to client to be included in the results            |
00190| | `isPaid`     | boolean | An order has to be payed (`true`) or not payed (`false`) to be included in the results                              |
00191| | `isTaken`    | boolean | An order has to be accepted (`true`) or not accepted (`false`) at a shipping terminal to be included in the results |
00192| 
00193| ***
00194| 
00195| 
00196| ### <a name="get-response"/>Response data
00197| 
00198| * [Example of a response](#get-response-example)
00199| * [Description of a response](#get-response-description)
00200| 
00201| <a name="get-response-example"/>Example of a response:
00202| 
00203| ```javascript
00204| {
00205|   "response": {
00206|     "data": [
00207|       {
00208|         "number": "600331378", // order number
00209|         "id": "3a0421c4-aff4-11e6-80f4-00155d903d0c", // unique order ID
00210|         "status": "Заказ отменен", // order state in plain text
00211|         "dates": {
00212|           "create": "2016-11-21T17:10:24", // when order has been created (finalized)
00213|           "taken": "", // when cargo has been accepted at a shipping terminal
00214|           "shipped": "", // when cargo has been sent from a shipping terminal to a delivery terminal
00215|           "arrived": "", // when cargo has been delivered at a delivery terminal
00216|           "given": "" // when cargo has been given out to a client
00217|         },
00218|         "basePrice": 1020, // base order cost (no discounts)
00219|         "price": 1020, // total order cost (including discounts)
00220|         "service": [ // array of order services
00221|           {
00222|             "name": "Перевозка между городами", // name of the service
00223|             "price": 190 // cost of the service (including discounts)
00224|           },
00225|           {
00226|             "name": "Забор груза от клиента",
00227|             "price": 380
00228|           },
00229|           {
00230|             "name": "Отвоз груза клиенту",
00231|             "price": 450
00232|           }
00233|         ],
00234|         "cargo": {
00235|           "dimension": { // object of cargo dimensions. See "cargo" structure
00236|             "max": {
00237|               "height": 0.1, // max height of a collo
00238|               "length": 0.1, // max length of a collo
00239|               "weight": 0.1, // max weight of a collo
00240|               "width": 0.1 // max width of a collo
00241|             },
00242|             "quantity": 1, // quantity of colli of the cargo
00243|             "volume": 0.1, // general volume of the cargo
00244|             "weight": 0.9 // general weight of the cargo
00245|           }
00246|         },
00247|         "customId": "", // your custom ID if you want to filter by it afterwards (any string)
00248|         "gateway": { // See "gateway" structure
00249|           "dispatch": { // pickup/shipping
00250|             "point": { 
00251|               "location": { 
00252|                 "id": "e90f19de-0128-11e5-80c7-00155d903d03", // unique internal location ID
00253|                 "name": "Санкт-Петербург", // location name
00254|                 "type": "г" // location type (abbreviated)
00255|               },
00256|               "address": "Пример ул., 1", // address
00257|               "date": "2016-11-22", // date of the pickup
00258|               "time": { // time of the pickup
00259|                 "start": "09:00", // start of the diapason
00260|                 "end": "14:00" // end of the diapason
00261|               }
00262|             },
00263|             "customer": { // contractor (shipper)
00264|               "type": "individual", // not a corporate
00265|               "name": "Арсеньев Сергей Денисович", // name, surname, patronym, if needed
00266|               "phone": [ // up to 3 phone numbers
00267|                 "79111883409"
00268|               ],
00269|               "email": "" // e-mail (the more options for a contact the better)
00270|             }
00271|           },
00272|           "destination": { // delivery/receiving point
00273|             "point": {
00274|               "location": {
00275|                 "id": "e90f1820-0128-11e5-80c7-00155d903d03",
00276|                 "name": "Москва",
00277|                 "type": "г"
00278|               },
00279|               "address": "Большой пр-т, 18",
00280|               "date": "2016-11-23", // date of the delivery
00281|               "time": { // time of the delivery
00282|                 "start": "14:00",
00283|                 "end": "19:00"
00284|               }
00285|             },
00286|             "customer": { // contractor (receiver)
00287|               "type": "individual",
00288|               "name": "Арсеньева Светлана Дмитриевна",
00289|               "phone": [
00290|                 "79111883409"
00291|               ],
00292|               "email": ""
00293|             }
00294|           }
00295|         }
00296|       }
00297|       // here can be more orders with the similar structure
00298|     ],
00299|     "meta": { // meta data
00300|       "limit": 100, // limiting the number of orders returned
00301|       "offset": 0, // offset in the array of orders returned
00302|       "total": 1 // total count of orders satisfying the filtering conditions
00303|     }
00304|   }
00305| }
00306| ```
00307| 
00308| <a name="get-response-description"/>Description of a response:
00309| 
00310| | Name                                                   | Type    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
00311| |--------------------------------------------------------|---------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00312| | `basePrice`                                            | integer | Basic cost of the order (excluding discounts)                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
00313| | `customId`                                             | string  | Custom order number, if specified during creation (finalization)                                                                                                                                                                                           |
00314| | [`dates`](../structure/dates.md)                       | object  | Object that contains dates for order stages. See [Dates of order stage changes](../structure/dates.md)                                                                                                                                                     |
00315| | `documentList`                                         | array   | List of available documents. The key is the document code, the value is the direct link to the document (these links can be transferred to third parties for use; your API token is not required there, keep it safe). The full list of documents is below |
00316| | `cargo`.[`dimension`](../structure/cargo.md#dimension) | object  | Cargo dimensions object. See [Cargo Dimension structure](../structure/cargo.md#dimension)                                                                                                                                                                  |
00317| | `cargo`.`insurance`                                    | integer | Declared cost of cargo insurance. The value is the cost and if it's set, this insurance considered selected                                                                                                                                                |
00318| | `cargo`.`insuranceNdv`                                 | boolean | Insurance with no declared value. `false` for turning it off, `true` by default                                                                                                                                                                            |
00319| | `gateway`                                              | object  | Object of the structure [Gateway](../structure/gateway.md), with the exception of the `service` node, services are returned in the root `service` node (see below)                                                                                         |
00320| | `id`                                                   | string  | Unique internal order ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
00321| | `number`                                               | integer | Order number                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
00322| | `price`                                                | integer | Total cost (including discounts)                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
00323| | `service`                                              | array   | An array of services, indicating the name and cost (including discounts)                                                                                                                                                                                   |
00324| | `service[n].name`                                      | string  | Name of the service                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
00325| | `service[n].price`                                     | integer | Cost of the service (including discounts)                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
00326| | `status`                                               | object  | Object that contains the current order state                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
00327| | `status.code`                                          | string  | Order state code                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
00328| | `status.message`                                       | string  | Order state description (plain text representation of the code)                                                                                                                                                                                            |
00329| 
00330| List of the documents:
00331| 
00332| | Code          | Description                                                                     |
00333| |---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00334| | `cargoPhoto`  | Cargo photo(s) (archive)                                                        |
00335| | `cmr`         | Cargo Movement Request, international waybill                                   |
00336| | `doc`         | Order form                                                                      |
00337| | `invoice`     | Order invoice                                                                   |
00338| | `markingList` | Marking sheet, labeling sheet                                                   |
00339| | `lrc`         | Lesser Receipt Certificate, online version of Forwarders Certificate of Receipt |
00340| | `scn`         | Scan of a consignation note (issue slip, delivery order)                        |
00341| | `ssd`         | Scans of accompanying documents                                                 |
00342| | `utd`         | Universal Transfer Document, integrated delivery note                           |
00343| 
00344| 
00345| ### <a name="get-example-full"/>Examples
00346| 
00347| **Request**
00348| 
00349| ```javascript
00350| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00351| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00352| {
00353|   "object": "order",
00354|   "action": "set",
00355|   "params": {
00356|     "filters": {
00357|       "number": "МойПользовательскийНомер"
00358|     }
00359|   }
00360| }));
00361| ```
00362|

00504| 
00505| ## <a name="set"/>Creating (finalizing) or updating order. Action `set`
00506| 
00507| ### Request data
00508| 
00509| * [Example of a structure](#set-example)
00510| * [Root structure](#set-struct)
00511| 
00512| ***
00513| 
00514| #### <a name="set-example"/>Example of a structure
00515| 
00516| ```javascript
00517| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00518| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00519| {
00520|   "object": "order",
00521|   "action": "set",
00522|   "params": {
00523|     "cargo": {
00524|       "category": "12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab", // unique internal category ID, optional
00525|       "correspondence": true, // has correspondence been included (additional safe package with the documents)
00526|       "dimension": { // cargo dimensions
00527|         "max": { // maximum dimensions of a collo
00528|           "height": 0.5, // max height of a collo
00529|           "length": 0.5, // max length of a collo
00530|           "weight": 5.3, // max weight of a collo
00531|           "width": 0.5 // max width of a collo
00532|         },
00533|         "quantity": 2, // quantity of colli of the cargo
00534|         "volume": 0.9, // general volume of the cargo
00535|         "weight": 5.3 // general weight of the cargo
00536|       },
00537|       "insurance": 1000, // declared cost of cargo insurance (if needed, omit it otherwise)
00538|       "insuranceNdv": false, // if you need to turn off insurnace with no declared value (cost) for a payer which is individual customer (will be turned off automatically if you use standard insurance (the one with declared cost))
00539|       "wrapping": { // packaging the cargo
00540|         "bag1": 1, // 1 pc. of wrapping with the `bag1` code
00541|         "box1": 2, // 2 pcs. of wrapping with the `box1` code
00542|         "palletCollar": 0.5 // 0.5m^3 of volumetric wrapping with the `palletCollar` code
00543|       }
00544|     },
00545|     "customId": "MW0123456/ZX15", // custom user ID, defined by you. Optional
00546|     "gateway": { // settings of shipping and receiving
00547|       "dispatch": { // pickup/shipping
00548|         "point": {
00549|           "location": "Санкт-Петербург", // dispatch location
00550|           "address": "Луначарского ул., 7", // dispatch address
00551|           "date": "2017-05-01", // date of the pickup
00552|           "time": { // datetime diapason for the pickup
00553|             "start": "14:00",
00554|             "end": "18:00"
00555|           }
00556|         },
00557|         "service": { // services you want to use in the order
00558|           "needLoading": { // loading service
00559|             "floor": 21, // 21st floor
00560|             "hasLift": true // there's cargo elevator (lift) in the building
00561|           },
00562|           "specificLoading": [ // specific type transport
00563|             "openMachine" // The client is provided with a vehicle with an open body (only sides, no awning)
00564|           ],
00565|           "retrieveAD": { // return accompanying documents, note that this node is also a `point` node
00566|             "location": "Выборг", // location to deliver documents to
00567|             "address": "Просвещения пр-т" // address to deliver documents to
00568|           }
00569|         },
00570|         "customer": { // customer (shipper)
00571|           "email": "customer@ya.ru", // e-mail
00572|           "id": "ivan", // temporary ID for this request. Optional. `dispatch` by default
00573|           "type": "individual", // not a corporate customer
00574|           "name": "Иванов Иван Иванович", // surname, name, patronym
00575|           "phone": "79999999999" // phone number for a contact
00576|         }
00577|       },
00578|       "destination": { // delivery
00579|         "point": {
00580|           "location": "Москва", // delivery location
00581|           "terminal": "1c9871-e09d-df43423-1234-123456", // unique internal terminal ID
00582|           "date": "2017-05-08" // delivery date
00583|         },
00584|         "service": { // services
00585|           "needLoading": { // offloading (won't be used for a delivery terminal, so it's here for an example)
00586|             "used": false // do not include this service
00587|           },
00588|           "specificLoading": [ // specific type transport
00589|             "tailLift"
00590|           ]
00591|         },
00592|         "customer": { // customer (receiver)
00593|           "type": "corporation", // corporate customer
00594|           "companyName": "АЛЬЯНС", // company name
00595|           "name": "Ivanov Ilya", // name, surname of a contact person
00596|           "phone": [ // phone numbers' list
00597|             "79999999999",
00598|             "79998888888"
00599|           ],
00600|           "kpp": "111111111", // reason code
00601|           "inn": "222222222222" // tax ID
00602|         }
00603|       }
00604|     },
00605|     "payer": "ivan", // sets the dispatch customer as payer (by temporary ID). Can be omitted if payer is a receiver customer
00606|     "promoCode": "promo" // promo code, if available
00607|   }
00608| }));
00609| ```
00610| 
00611| #### <a name="get-struct"/>Root structure. Passed directly into the `params` node
00612| 
00613| | Structure      | Type           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
00614| |----------------|----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00615| | **Required**   |   
00616| | `cargo`        | object         | ["Cargo" structure](../structure/cargo.md) _(on another page)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
00617| | `gateway`      | object         | ["Gateway" structure](../structure/gateway.md) _(on another page)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
00618| | `payer`        | string\|object | String with a temporary ID specified (or not specified) for counterparties in the "Gateway" structure. The default value is `destination`, that means receiver of the cargo is the payer (for example, if you want set receiver as the payer without temporary ID, set it to `destination`). **Can also be a third party**, then contents of this node must be an instance of [Customer structure](../structure/customer.md) _(on another page)_ |
00619| | **Optional**   | 
00620| | `cod`          | object         | [Cash-on-delivery structure](../structure/cod.md) _(on another page)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
00621| | `customId`     | string         | Order ID, defined by user. Ypu can use it in the filters to get this order. Optional. In any case each order has a unique public order number and a unique internal ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
00622| | `promoCode`    | string         | Promo code, if available. Optional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
00623| 
00624| ### <a name="get-response"/>Response data
00625| 
00626| * [Example of a response](#set-response-example)
00627| * [Description of a response](#set-response-description)
00628| 
00629| <a name="set-response-example"/>Example of a response
00630| 
00631| ```javascript
00632| {
00633|   "response": {
00634|     "id": "3afda4a6-46cf-11e7-80f9-00155d189b14", // unique internal order ID
00635|     "number": "700247223", // order number
00636|     "basePrice": 2440, // base cost of the order (excluding discounts)
00637|     "price": 2440, // total cost of the order (including discounts)
00638|     "service": [
00639|       {
00640|         "name": "Перевозка между городами", // name of the service
00641|         "price": 495 // cost of the service (including discounts)
00642|       },
00643|       {
00644|         "name": "Жесткий короб",
00645|         "price": 800
00646|       },
00647|       {
00648|         "name": "Упаковка в коробку (20х20х40)",
00649|         "price": 140
00650|       },
00651|       {
00652|         "name": "Страхование груза без объявленной стоимости",
00653|         "price": 35
00654|       },
00655|       {
00656|         "name": "Забор груза от клиента",
00657|         "price": 380
00658|       },
00659|       {
00660|         "name": "Отвоз груза клиенту",
00661|         "price": 590
00662|       }
00663|     ]
00664|   }
00665| }
00666| ```
00667| 
00668| <a name="set-response-description"/>Description of a response
00669| 
00670| | Name             | Type    | Description                                                              |
00671| |------------------|---------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00672| | id               | string  | Unique internal order ID                                                 |
00673| | number           | integer | Order number                                                             |
00674| | basePrice        | integer | Basic cost of the order (excluding discounts)                            |
00675| | price            | integer | Total cost of the order (including discounts)                            |
00676| | service          | array   | An array of services, indicating the name and cost (including discounts) |
00677| | service[n].name  | string  | Name of the service                                                      |
00678| | service[n].price | integer | Cost of the service (including discounts)                                |
00679| 
00680| ### <a name="set-example-full"/>Examples
00681| 
00682| **Request**
00683| 
00684| ```javascript
00685| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00686| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00687| {
00688|   "object": "order",
00689|   "action": "set",
00690|   "params": {
00691|     "cargo": {
00692|       "dimension": {
00693|         "volume": 0.1,
00694|         "weight": 0.9,
00695|       },
00696|       "wrapping": {
00697|         "box1": 2,
00698|         "hardBoxVolume": 0.5
00699|       }
00700|     },
00701|     "gateway": {
00702|       "dispatch": {
00703|         "point": {
00704|           "location": "Санкт-Петербург",
00705|           "address": "Пивоварная ул. 11",
00706|           "date": "2017-06-03",
00707|           "time": {
00708|             "start": "10:00",
00709|             "end": "16:00"
00710|           }
00711|         },
00712|         "customer": {
00713|           "name": "Name 1",
00714|           "phone": "79092407718"
00715|         }
00716|       },
00717|       "destination": {
00718|         "point": {
00719|           "location": "Москва",
00720|           "address": "Ячменный пер., 69",
00721|           "date": "2017-06-07",
00722|           "time": {
00723|             "start": "10:00",
00724|             "end": "16:00"
00725|           }
00726|         },
00727|         "customer": {
00728|           "id": "name2",
00729|           "name": "Name 2",
00730|           "phone": "79092407700"
00731|         }
00732|       }
00733|     },
00734|     "payer": "name2"
00735|   }
00736| }));
00737| ```
00738| 
00739| **Response**
00740| 
00741| ```javascript
00742| {
00743|   "response": {
00744|     "id": "3afda4a6-46cf-11e7-80f9-00155d189b14", // unique internal order ID
00745|     "number": "700247223", // order number
00746|     "basePrice": 2440, // base cost of the order
00747|     "price": 2440, // total cost of the order
00748|     "service": [
00749|       {
00750|         "name": "Перевозка между городами", // name of the service
00751|         "price": 495 // cost of the service
00752|       },
00753|       {
00754|         "name": "Жесткий короб",
00755|         "price": 800
00756|       },
00757|       {
00758|         "name": "Упаковка в коробку (20х20х40)",
00759|         "price": 140
00760|       },
00761|       {
00762|         "name": "Страхование груза без объявленной стоимости",
00763|         "price": 35
00764|       },
00765|       {
00766|         "name": "Забор груза от клиента",
00767|         "price": 380
00768|       },
00769|       {
00770|         "name": "Отвоз груза клиенту",
00771|         "price": 590
00772|       }
00773|     ]
00774|   }
00775| }
00776| ```
00777| 
00778| ## <a name="cancel"/>Canceling an order
00779| 
00780| Represents an object used to cancel a placed order.
00781| 
00782| **Request**
00783| 
00784| ```javascript
00785| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00786| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00787| {
00788|   "object": "order",
00789|   "action": "cancel",
00790|   "params": {
00791|     "id": "3afda4a6-46cf-11e7-80f9-00155d189b14", // unique internal order ID
00792|     "reason": "Тестовый заказ. Проверяли работоспособность" // reason of canceling an order in free form
00793|   }
00794| }));
00795| ```
00796| 
00797| **Response**
00798| 
00799| ```javascript
00800| {
00801|   "response": {
00802|     "message": "Заказ успешно отменён" // if error occured, there will be an error object
00803|   }
00804| }
00805| ```
00806| 
00807| ***
00808| [▲ Up](#up)
00809| 
</file>
